mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.user_id, p.nick_name, p.pic, p.`level`, case p.quality when 1 then "普通" when 2 then "精品" when 3 then "稀有" when 4 then "传说" when 5 then "5史诗" when 6 then "神话" end , p.exp, p.ce, p.gold, p.dp, p.de, p.hd, p.hp, p.mp, p.maxhd, p.maxhp, p.maxmp, i.item_name item, t.`name` FROM ( `pet` p, `user` u, pet_type t ) LEFT JOIN item i ON i.id = p.item WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND p.user_id = u.id AND p.pet_type = t.id
